EmailTemplate.name: GOAL: Complaint Acknowledgement Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Complaint Acknowledgement - Reference {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}
Your (complaint / enquiry) has been received by the Customer Relations Team, who will either respond to it or pass it on to someone who can.
The Council’s targets for responding to complaints are:
Stage 1 We will respond within 10 working days of receipt, or we will contact you with an update
Stage 2 We will respond within 10 working days of receipt, or we will contact you with an update
Stage 3 We will tell you the timescales involved and keep you updated.
Requests for Information are dealt as follows:
Freedom of Information Request A response will be issued within 20 working days
Subject Access Request A response will be issued within 40 calendar days
You can find the Council’s Complaints Policy at www.hounslow.gov.uk
